title: Presidential (Emoluments) (Amendment) Regulations, 2022
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government
Gazette dated Friday, 11th February, 2022 27
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 14 OF 2022
The Presidential Emoluments Act
(Laws, Volume 15, Cap. 261)
The Presidential (Emoluments) (Amendment)
Regulations, 2022
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 2 of the
Presidential Emoluments Act, and after consultations with the
Standing Orders Committee of the National Assembly, the
following Regulations are made:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Presidential Title and
(Emoluments) (Amendment) Regulations, 2022, and shall be read commencement
as one with the Presidential Emoluments Regulations, 2009, in S.I. No. 61
these Regulations referred to as the principal Regulations. of 2009
(2) These Regulations are deemed to have come into
operation on 1st January, 2022.
2. The principal Regulations are amended by the revocation Revocation
